Energy & Natural Resources Responsible use of our land and natural resources is our highest priority. […]
data.text:
Sanbell is a multi-disciplinary engineering, community planning, and design firm serving clients throughout the West. Built by merging 4 strong firms with similar foundational and cultural values, our team of engineers, planners, landscape architects, surveyors, and designers is now stronger.

We Design Better Together.

Prior to the merger, Michael led Sanderson Stewart for over 15 years and now continues in the CEO role in the newly formed company. He is looking forward to our exciting new future under one bold new brand.

“Our exciting new Sanbell brand represents energy, optimism and the boundless opportunities our merged family of companies will provide for our team members and our clients.”

Michael recently sat down with the Billings Chamber of Commerce to discuss community development, listen to what he had to say.
